ImageOptimizer_ThreadCount_Description: More threads = faster processing ({0} logical cores detected)
ImageOptimizer_CreateBackups_Description: Saves originals as preview-bk-001.jpg, preview-bk-002.jpg, etc.
ImageOptimizer_KeepOriginals_Description: Original files will not be deleted (e.g., preview.png remains alongside preview.jpg)
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Full_Description: Complete optimization: resize to 512x512, smart crop, convert to JPEG, and generate miniatures
ImageOptimizer_Mode_NoResize_Description: Optimize quality and convert to JPEG without resizing or cropping
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Rename_Description: Only rename files to standard names (preview.jpg, disabled.jpg)
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Disabled_Description: No automatic optimization will be performed
